awd_titl_txt: Conference -- Endangered Earth:  An Evolutionary            Perspective
awd_abstract_narration: This is a grant for support for a conference organized by                  UCLA titled, Endangered Earth:  An Evolutionary Perspective.                                                                                                    It is scheduled for January 16-18 1990 and has three primary                    objectives:                                                                                                                                                     1.  To provide a focus for the development of interdisciplinary                 teaching and research on Global Change within the University of                 California System and more broadly across the California                        scientific research community.                                                                                                                                  2.  To inform a large and diverse academic and professional                     audience of the identified threats associate with Global Change,                and the possibilities for action and remediation.                                                                                                               3.  To bring together leading experts in fields spanning the                    geophysical, biological and social sciences for an interchange                  of concepts that ultimately must merge in an practical response                 to Global Change.                                                                                                                                                    This conference is important because it seeks to stimulate                 cross-disciplinary interactions on an environmental problem/issue               of major significance.
org_div_long_name: Division of Atmospheric and Geospace Sciences
